db:abstract.db:para: The base class for jobs executed in an aspect.

db:section.db:title: void QAspectJob::addDependency(QWeakPointer<Qt3DCore::QAspectJob> dependency)
db:section.db:para: Adds dependency to the aspect job.

db:section.db:title: const std::vector<QWeakPointer<Qt3DCore::QAspectJob>> &QAspectJob::dependencies() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the dependencies of the aspect job.

db:section.db:title: [virtual] bool QAspectJob::isRequired()
db:section.db:para: Should return true (default) if the job has actually something to do. If returning false, the job will not be scheduled (but it's dependencies will be).

db:section.db:title: [virtual] void QAspectJob::postFrame(Qt3DCore::QAspectEngine *aspectEngine)
db:section.db:para: Called in the main thread when all the jobs have completed. This is a good point to push changes back to the frontend. aspectEngine is the engine responsible for the run loop.

db:section.db:title: void QAspectJob::removeDependency(QWeakPointer<Qt3DCore::QAspectJob> dependency)
db:section.db:para: Removes the given dependency from aspect job.

db:section.db:title: [pure virtual] void QAspectJob::run()
db:section.db:para: Executes the job. This is called on a separate thread by the scheduler.
